---
title: "Videos"
listing:
  contents: videos
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  fields: [title, author, date, date-added, categories, status]
  field-display-names:
    status: "Status"
    categories: "Topics"
    date-added: "Added"
page-layout: full
---

<style>
.filter-controls {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  align-items: center;
}

.filter-row {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
}

.filter-label {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #6c757d;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-right: 0.25rem;
}

.filter-btn {
  padding: 0.5rem 1.5rem;
  border: 2px solid #dee2e6;
  background: white;
  color: #495057;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.filter-btn:hover {
  border-color: #0d6efd;
  color: #0d6efd;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.15);
}

.filter-btn.active {
  background: #0d6efd;
  border-color: #0d6efd;
  color: white;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.3);
}
</style>

<div class="filter-controls">
  <div class="filter-row">
    <span class="filter-label">Status:</span>
    <button class="filter-btn active" onclick="filterByStatus('all', this)">All</button>
    <button class="filter-btn" onclick="filterByStatus('to-watch', this)">To Watch</button>
    <button class="filter-btn" onclick="filterByStatus('finished', this)">Finished</button>
  </div>
  <div class="filter-row">
    <span class="filter-label">Sort by:</span>
    <button class="filter-btn active" onclick="sortBy('date', this)">Video Date</button>
    <button class="filter-btn" onclick="sortBy('date-added', this)">Date Added</button>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
let currentStatus = 'all';

function filterByStatus(status, btn) {
  currentStatus = status;
  
  // Update button states in status row
  btn.parentElement.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
  btn.classList.add('active');
  
  applyFilters();
}

function sortBy(field, btn) {
  // Update button states in sort row
  btn.parentElement.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
  btn.classList.add('active');
  
  const listingContainer = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing');
  const items = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.quarto-post'));
  
  items.sort((a, b) => {
    let aVal, bVal;
    if (field === 'date') {
      aVal = a.querySelector('.listing-date')?.textContent.trim() || '';
      bVal = b.querySelector('.listing-date')?.textContent.trim() || '';
    } else if (field === 'date-added') {
      aVal = a.querySelector('.listing-date-added')?.textContent.trim() || '';
      bVal = b.querySelector('.listing-date-added')?.textContent.trim() || '';
    }
    // Parse dates and sort descending (newest first)
    const dateA = new Date(aVal);
    const dateB = new Date(bVal);
    return dateB - dateA;
  });
  
  // Reorder DOM elements
  items.forEach(item => listingContainer.appendChild(item));
  
  applyFilters();
}

function applyFilters() {
  const items = document.querySelectorAll('.quarto-post');
  
  items.forEach(item => {
    let show = true;
    
    // Status filter
    if (currentStatus !== 'all') {
      const statusBadge = item.querySelector('.listing-status');
      const itemStatus = statusBadge ? statusBadge.textContent.trim().toLowerCase() : '';
      if (itemStatus !== currentStatus) {
        show = false;
      }
    }
    
    item.style.display = show ? '' : 'none';
  });
}
</script>

A curated collection of talks, lectures, and videos worth watching.
